name: Quizlet Black Theme [V1.0]
description: Is Quizlet's own dark theme not dark enough for you? Try this style! This style makes Quizlet even darker! For optimal use, turn on Quizlet's own dark theme while using this style! Want more dark or black themes? Visit my profile!
